None.Name: Looter
None.Description: As long as the unit attacks a building or a unit, a certain amount of the target's original power costs depending on its current life points are gained as power.

Extra.en: Looter will make the player gain 40% of the structure's power cost,  depending on its current lifepoints relative to its maximum lifepoints as power for themselves at U0.
